name: Puzzle Bobble
body:
# Puzzle Bobble
## by Compilation Lords

Puzzle Bobble is an arcade game published by Taito Corporation in 1994. Its aesthetic and charisma soon converted the game in a piece of pop-culture. 

![](https://i.ytimg.com/vi/k0rLMeoGcJk/maxresdefault.jpg)

The rules are easy: you must destroy all bubbles hitting three or more of the same color. When the bubbles reach the bottom line, the game will end. 

The Compilation Lords staff had created a version of the original arcade multiplayer mode. Enjoy it!

![](http://s33.postimg.org/mq9509667/Captura.png)


##Compilation Lords staff

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/carcasanchez/Puzzle-Bobble/master/Photos_Images/Grupo.jpg)


[**Francisco Ruíz Giménez:**](https://github.com/ValencianoFran) Coder

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/carcasanchez/Puzzle-Bobble/master/Photos_Images/FranC.jpg)

[**Carlos Cabreira Sánchez:**](https://github.com/carcasanchez) Management responsable

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/carcasanchez/Puzzle-Bobble/master/Photos_Images/CarlosC.jpg)

[**Marc Latorre Freixes:**](https://github.com/marclafr) Coder

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/carcasanchez/Puzzle-Bobble/master/Photos_Images/MarcC.jpg)

[**Andreu Rojas Barrera:**](https://github.com/Jergar92) QA 

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/carcasanchez/Puzzle-Bobble/master/Photos_Images/AndreuC.jpg)

[**Jordi Oña Rufí:**](https://github.com/jordior97) Art / Design

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/carcasanchez/Puzzle-Bobble/master/Photos_Images/JordiC.jpg)

In despise of the current responability, each member of the team has worked on the code of the game.


##Game Controls

Use SPACE to move from the Start Screen to the Game Screen

###Player 1 (left):

A: move the arrow to the left.

D: move the arrow to the right.

W: shoot the current bobble.

###Player 2 (right):

Left arrow: move the arrow to the left.

Right arrow: move the arrow to the right.

Up arrow: shoot the current bobble.


##Dowload the latest version of Puzzle Bubble [here](https://github.com/carcasanchez/Puzzle-Bobble/releases)!
##Check our Github Repositorie [here](https://github.com/carcasanchez/Puzzle-Bobble)!
##See more information in the [Puzzle Bobble Wiki](https://github.com/carcasanchez/Puzzle-Bobble/wiki/Welcome-Page)!
